item.description:
Science Fiction writer Neal Stephenson is at MIT on Tuesday, April 17th for an informal conversation with MIT Technology Review editor-in-chief Jason Pontin. During the hour-long conversation, they’ll discuss Stephenson’s craft, preoccupations, influences, and inspirations. Afterwards, Stephenson will take 30 minutes of questions from the audience.

** YOU MUST HAVE A TICKET TO ATTEND THIS EVENT **

Say you'll be there here on Meetup.com but to obtain an "official" ticket" please RSVP at http://techre.vu/HR8HlD. It’s free and open to the public.

Nerd Fun - Boston meetup members can use the "secret" ticket promo code nerdfun on the EventBrite RSVP page that unlocks tickets set aside for the group.
item.name: Legendary Science Fiction Writer Neal Stephenson at MIT
